xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.22 Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 1.22.1 Anidassanasappaṭighapada » 1.22.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Anidassanasappaṭighapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
541.
1216Nahetuṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  adhipatipaccayā…  sahajātapaccayā…  aññamaññapaccayā…  nissayapaccayā…  kammapaccayā…  vipākapaccayā…  āhārapaccayā…  indriyapaccayā…  jhānapaccayā…  maggapaccayā…  vippayuttapaccayā…  atthipaccayā…  avigatapaccayā.
<< Paccayacatukkaup Suddha >>
